text: Chester Ira Mead (February 19, 1900 – February 11, 1959) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Iowa Wesleyan College in Mount Pleasant, Iowa from 1924 to 1925, compiling a record of 6–12. Mead played college football at the University of Iowa from 1920 to 1922. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1900 births Category:1959 deaths Category:American football guards Category:Iowa Hawkeyes football players Category:Iowa Wesleyan Tigers football coaches
title: Chester Mead
